mrgsolve
  • Reference
  • News

Set the

Set the Request argument for mrgsim.

Req(x, ...)

# S4 method for mrgmod
Req(x, ...)

req(x, ...)

# S4 method for mrgmod
req(x, ...)

Arguments

x
model object
...
unquoted names of compartments or tabled items

Examples

mod <- mrgsolve:::house()
#> Warning: cannot open compressed file 'C:\Users\devin\Documents\Repos\mrgsolve/project/housemodel.RDS', probable reason 'No such file or directory'
#> Error in gzfile(file, "rb"): cannot open the connection

mod %>% Req(CP,RESP) %>% ev(amt=1000) %>%  mrgsim
#> Model:  demo.cpp 
#> Dim:    242 x 4 
#> Time:   0 to 24 
#> ID:     1 
#>      ID time  RESP    CP
#> [1,]  1  0.0 50.00  0.00
#> [2,]  1  0.0 50.00  0.00
#> [3,]  1  0.1 47.92  6.08
#> [4,]  1  0.2 44.07 11.39
#> [5,]  1  0.3 39.90 16.02
#> [6,]  1  0.4 35.89 20.06
#> [7,]  1  0.5 32.23 23.57
#> [8,]  1  0.6 28.96 26.63
